pageContext.claim: “He [Mike Bloomberg] had a deal with Hillary Clinton that he was going to become secretary of State.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump alleges some secret deal between Hillary Clinton and former New York City Mayor Mike Bloomberg to make Bloomberg Secretary of State if she won. There is no evidence that is the case. Trump appears to referring to an email exchange between a Clinton aide and a Bloomberg aide released by Wikileaks. The Clinton aide asked Bloomberg aide Howard Wolfson to confirm or deny reports that Bloomberg was considering entering the 2016 race. Wolfson replied that the reports were “laughable.” She then wrote back asking, “Is there something Mike Bloomberg would want to do in his life in an Admin? Is like Ambassador of China way too small.” Wolfson replied: “Secty of state Which ain’t gonna happen.”
